description.description: A short description of the functionality the service provides and/or the problems it aims to solve. Markdown is permitted.

name.description: A unique name for the service, consisting of lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

messages.description: The messages that may be exchanged by blocks and embedding applications as part of the service

version.description: The semantic version of this service specification

coreVersion.description: The version (or version range) of the core specification this is compatible with
